definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: The state of our inner-city schools is a case in point.
sentences.chinese: 我們內城區學校的狀況就是一個恰當的例子。

sentences.english: I have an inappropriate question: Can Buddhist avenge?
sentences.chinese: 問個不恰當的問題，學佛人可以報仇嗎？

sentences.english: In short, they might make better ethical decisions than people.
sentences.chinese: 簡言之，它們會比人類做出更恰當的道德判斷。

sentences.english: It is improper to cut in on a queue.
sentences.chinese: 突然插到排隊的行列中去是不恰當的。

sentences.english: As for foreign visitors, appropriate translations of signs are of great significance.
sentences.chinese: 對於國外遊客，景點牌示的恰當翻譯十分重要。

sentences.english: Whan an inept remark to make on such a formal occasion.
sentences.chinese: 在如此正式的場合，怎麼說這樣不恰當的話。

sentences.english: Great to use in the bath or shower.
It's not appropriate to grope or touch a woman unless you know she likes you.
sentences.chinese: 它的不恰當摸觸或女人，除非你知道她喜歡你。

sentences.english: However this year the police have vowed to arrest them for indecent exposure.
sentences.chinese: 然而，今年警方宣誓以不恰當暴露罪逮捕他們。

sentences.english: The communication fails without the proper import and export definition.
sentences.chinese: 沒有恰當的導入和導出定義，通信將失敗。

sentences.english: He later apologized for what he said was an “inappropriate” remark.
sentences.chinese: 之後他爲這一自稱爲不恰當的評論做出了道歉。

sentences.english: There's an allusion there to memory, which will be a little apropos for Problem Set 2.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個對內存的暗示，對於習題集2來說是恰當的。

sentences.english: Ensure back up rolls have correct barrel and relief.
sentences.chinese: 確保支撐輥的輥身完好，恰當的輥端倒角設計。

sentences.english: Verify that the listener program is starting the channel on the correct queue manager.
sentences.chinese: 證明偵聽器程序正開始通道在恰當隊列管理器上。

sentences.english: For example, well spaced writing indicates someone who respects others' space and privacy.
sentences.chinese: 例如，字間距離恰當表明這人尊重他人的空間和隱私。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
to be capable of/to be able to/can
timely/apt to the occasion/in due course
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
